attributes.action: Don't take transgender peoples right to use the toilet and seek healthcare away
attributes.additional_details: Don't listen to Liz Truss. Listen to every trans person in the uk
attributes.background:
Don't put forth the ban of the reversible hormone blockers
Don't make trans people use the changing rooms and toilets of their agab
Get an 'equality minister' that cares about minorities like transgender people

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not ban gender transition treatments for under 18s: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318025

Uphold current legal protections for transgender individuals and under 18s: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318175
